blocks.subject: Reliant
text: Yes, the offer is coming. It may take a few days to process it, but you can

blocks.subject: Summer Opportunity
text: I did get your phone message about the summer, but I still haven't heard from
Enron about an offer for summer employment.  I do have other offers with
other energy companies that I must respond to this week.  Could you let me
know as soon as possible if an offer will be made to me.
